StringProperty.Name: MODEL_NAME
StringProperty.Description: The name of the model published in the database, also the name of the executable (possibly with an appended suffix). The default is the name of the grandparent folder of the project file.

StringProperty.Name: SCENARIO_NAME
StringProperty.Description: The name of the default scenario published in the database. The default is Default.

StringProperty.Name: FIXED_NAME
StringProperty.Description: The name of a folder in parameters which contains values of fixed (invariant) parameters (in OpenM++).

BoolProperty.Name: GENERATE_HELP
BoolProperty.Description: Generate model encyclopedic help files after build. A compiled chm for the 0model is also generated if the required Microsoft components have been installed.

StringProperty.Name: MODEL_INI
StringProperty.Description: The name of an ini file located in the model root folder containing model run options. The default is MODEL_NAME.ini, if present. Values are propagated to the Modgen scex file. Note that overrides to parameter values in the model ini file are not propagated.

BoolProperty.Name: SCEX_COPY_PARAMETERS
BoolProperty.DisplayName: Copy all parameters to output DB
BoolProperty.Description: Indicate to copy all input parameters to the MS Access output database in the published Modgen scexfile. This is required to publish a model to Modgen Web.

BoolProperty.Name: GENERATE_DOCDB
BoolProperty.Description: Create the MS Access model documentation database after build. This database is required to publish a model to Modgen Web.

BoolProperty.Name: RUN_SCENARIO
BoolProperty.Description: Run the scenario after building and publishing the model and scenario.
